attributes.action: use the fuel tax to pay for green issues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i dont agree with the current fuel tax being passed on to travelling passengers.
But if we do have to pay this new tax, we should have a commitment from the government that the collected tax should be put towards paying for green issues eg- all new build should have solar panels, free light bulbs for pensioners etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
